values: 接近；靠近；着手处理；开始处理；找…商谈；找…商量；向…接洽；要求；建议；临近（未来时刻、未来事件）
方法；方式；途径；手段；接近；靠近；临近；进路；通道；道路；入口；进场；通路；（高尔夫）果岭前的一杆

word_mean_info__list.difference: 着重独特的程序或方式，尤指个人的偏爱或习惯。
指为达到某种目的或目标而采用的方法、手段或途径。
指从事某事的特别方法、途径。
普通用词，可指一般的方法，有时也指个人的方法或方式，也可指特殊的方式或方法。
指有系统、有条理地办事或解决问题的方法。
多指行动的特殊方式或独特的方法。
书面用词，常指因个人爱好或传统习俗等因素而遵循的方法。

word_group.brief_definition: 整体办法；整体做法；整体的办法
用...方式；借助...方法；以...方法
系统观点；系统研究法；系统性方针
灵活的方法；灵活的办法
主动方式；积极办法；主动方法
传统方法；传统取向；传统理论；传统研究方式
交际方法；交际方式；交际途径
谨慎的做法；谨慎的办法

bilingual.source: Sometimes the best approach is to let nature take its course.
bilingual.target: 有时候最好的办法就是顺其自然。

bilingual.source: In recent years, many mid-sized cities have begun to adopt a middle-of-the-road approach.
bilingual.target: 近年来，许多中型城市开始采用折中的办法。
罗森曼建议直接的办法。

bilingual.source: But ENN is focusing on a direct approach.
bilingual.target: 然而，新奥集团专注于一种直接的办法。

bilingual.source: The alternative approach is to be in continuous refinement phase.
bilingual.target: 相应的替代办法目前正处于不断完善的阶段。

bilingual.source: Tarecgosa says: More sentries approach! There's no other way…
bilingual.target: 塔瑞克苟莎说：更多哨卫来了！没别的办法了……

bilingual.source: Other strategies are even stranger. Some bacteria take Batman's approach.
bilingual.target: 另一种办法更加奇怪。一些病毒选择了蝙蝠侠的方法。

bilingual.source: News information integration requires a standardized and systematic management approach.
bilingual.target: 新闻信息资源整合需要有一套规范化、系统化的管理办法。

bilingual.source: The best way is to approach the use of food to promote their defecation .
bilingual.target: 最好的办法是采用食物办法促进其排便。

list.abstract: approach是一个英语单词，可以用作名词和动词，可以翻译为接近、走进，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: May I approach? Hurry, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有个办法。快说。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't stop our movement down this river, and we can't avoid the encounters. We can only approach them in the best possible way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们身在时间之河上停不下来，也无法避免问题。我们只能选择最好的处理办法。

yingyinNormal.en: And it's also possible that behavior takes a proprietary approach to problems like this to avoid having to admit when they fuck up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也有可能这种行为会为此类问题树立专有的解决办法，在他们搞砸的时候，就可以不用承认了。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Pratt and Mr. Keller have requested this forum, because they believe there is a better way than the adversarial approach of blame and denial.
yingyinNormal.zh: 普拉特先生和凯勒先生要求召开此讨论会，因为他们相信比起责备与否认等敌对方法，有更好的解决办法。

yingyinNormal.en: Mini-drones on approach, Trump Tower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小型无人侦查机靠近川普大厦。

yingyinNormal.en: Deep, deep space gives you a very, very fresh approach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 深邃的宇宙空间给了你非常非常新鲜的方法。

yingyinNormal.en: Unfortunately, Jim's approach would often confuse and bore people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不幸的是，Jim的方法往往会让人混淆也使人们感到无聊。

yingyinNormal.en: You're going off the grid. Exactly. The old Unabomber approach. Kudos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是在玩儿失踪啊。正解。早年炸弹客的做法啊，不错嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: That is a Shadow Approach with a Crackle Holler. Demonstrate. Stop. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用沙沙声加大吼的幻影法。请示范。停，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: All week I tried to approach her at school. She'd always find some way to duck me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我整个星期都在借机接近她，她却千方百计地避开我。

yingyinNormal.en: I found that if instead of dealing with these events as one-offs, I could see each as just another one of those, and approach them in the same way a biologist might approach an animal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我发现与其将他们当做一次性事件可以当做一类事件向生物学家处理动物一样处理这些事。

yingyinNormal.en: Right, right, whereas Jewish mothers take a casual, la-di-da approach to their sons.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，是啊，而犹太母亲一般都任自己的儿子自生自灭的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's startling to me you haven't considered a Lorentz invariant or field theory approach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 令我吃惊的是，你竟然没考虑洛伦兹不变量和场论步骤。

yingyinNormal.en: And I felt that the better approach would be to have a lower intensity and longer treatment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为最佳的处理方式是较低强度和较长时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Jim's new approach takes more time, energy, and rehearsal, but it's been well worth the effort.
yingyinNormal.zh: Jim的新方法虽然花上了比较多时间、经历和练习，但是一切的努力都是值得的。

yingyinNormal.en: As we approach Veterans' Day, we honor them and all those who've served to keep us free and strong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我们迎来退伍军人节时,我们向他们致敬所有那些服过役的人们让我们能够保持自由和强大。

yingyinNormal.en: And yet there was great tension this morning between you and General Braegher. Difference in approach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但今天上午你和布雷格将军闹得很紧张。见解不同。

yingyinNormal.en: Plus a roundtable on the nonequilibrium green's function approach to the photoionization process in atoms.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有用非平衡格林函数解决原子内光化电离过程的圆桌会议呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Ma'am, we need to approach the planet in the direction it's moving. That way, we benefit from its energy of motion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长官，我们应顺着其运行方向接近这颗行星，这样就能充分利用其动能。

yingyinNormal.en: After poaching my case. No. We did not approach the client. She approached us, disappointed with your representation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在抢走我的案子后。不对，该委托人不是我们抢来的。是她找的我们她对你们的辩护不满意

exam_freq_info.chinese: 靠近; 接近; 临近

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 友好的；易攀谈的；可以某种方式到达的

word_family.mean: v. 接近；靠近；找…商谈；找… 商量；向…接洽；着手处理；临近（未来时刻；未来事件）；临近；数量（或质量）上接近（某一数字；某种水平

sense_info_list.en: a way of dealing with something or thinking about something, such as a problem or a task

examination_example.sentence: Another <highlight>approach</highlight> to getting more done in less time is to rethink how you prioritise your day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种在更短的时间内完成更多工作的方法是重新思考如何安排一天的优先级。

examination_example.sentence: There are a number of <highlight>approaches</highlight> to mastering the art of deep work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有许多方法可以掌握深度工作的艺术。

examination_example.sentence: That is a necessary and practical <highlight>approach</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个必要且实际的方法。

sense_info_list.en: come near someone or something in distance, time, level, or event
sense_info_list.zh: 靠近; 接近; 临近

examination_example.sentence: Profit margins <highlight>approaching</highlight> 40% on their operations at a time when the rest of the publishing industry is in an existential crisis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当出版业的其他部门处于生存危机时，他们的利润率接近40%。

examination_example.sentence: Please don't <highlight>approach</highlight> me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请不要靠近我。

sense_info_list.en: start to deal with something in a certain way

examination_example.sentence: Thinking of time as a resource to be maximised means you <highlight>approach</highlight> it instrumentally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把时间看作是一种需要最大化利用的资源意味着你可以利用它。

examination_example.sentence: It also points to a broader truth about how we now <highlight>approach</highlight> the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它还指出了一个关于我们现在如何对待过去的更广泛的真相。

sense_info_list.en: speak to (someone) for the first time about something, typically with a proposal or request

examination_example.sentence: A publishing firm <highlight>approached</highlight> Dickens to write a story in monthly installments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一家出版公司与狄更斯接洽，希望他每月分期写一篇小说。

sense_info_list.en: a road, sea passage, or other way leading to a place

word_usage.usage: approach作名词表示“对……的方式，方法，态度”一般用approach to sth.或to doing sth.。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 友好的；易攀谈的；可以某种方式到达的

word_family.mean: v. 接近；靠近；找…商谈；找… 商量；向…接洽；着手处理；临近（未来时刻；未来事件）；临近；数量（或质量）上接近（某一数字；某种水平

sense_info_list.en: a way of dealing with something or thinking about something, such as a problem or a task

examination_example.sentence: I've had more feedback in a passive <highlight>approach</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我用被动的方式得到了更多的反馈。

examination_example.sentence: Yuuji Kimura and colleagues in Japan tried a more physical <highlight>approach</highlight> rather than adding other metals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Yuuji Kimura 和他的日本同事尝试了一种更为物理的方法，而不是添加其他金属。

examination_example.sentence: These studies are confirming, challenging and extending what's been found using more traditional <highlight>approaches</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些研究正在证实，挑战和扩展使用传统的方法发现的结果。

examination_example.sentence: We're learning that student success requires a more comprehensive <highlight>approach</highlight>, one that incorporates not only academic skills but also social, self-regulatory and attention skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们正了解到，一个孩子的学术成功综合了多方面的能力，不仅包括学习技能，而且包括社交能力、自我调节能力以及注意力能力。

examination_example.sentence: Their <highlight>approach</highlight> is flexible enough that in principle other important quality-of-life changes could be incorporated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们的方法很灵活，原则上可以纳入其他重要的生活质量变化。

sense_info_list.en: come near someone or something in distance, time, level, or event

examination_example.sentence: The average student's debt upon graduation now <highlight>approaches</highlight> $40, 000, and as college becomes ever more expensive, calls to make it "free" are multiplying.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，学生在毕业时的平均负债接近4万美元。上大学变得越来越贵，让它“免费”的呼声越来越高。

sense_info_list.en: start to deal with something in a certain way
a road, sea passage, or other way leading to a place
the most similar thing to something else that is mentioned

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从事某事的特别方法、途径。
着重独特的程序或方式, 尤指个人的偏爱或习惯。
多指行动的特殊方式或独特的方法。
指为达到某种目的或目标而采用的方法、手段或途径。
指有系统、有条理地办事或解决问题的方法。
书面用词, 常指因个人爱好或传统习俗等因素而遵循的方法。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 友好的；易攀谈的；可以某种方式到达的

word_family.mean: v. 接近；靠近；找…商谈；找… 商量；向…接洽；着手处理；临近（未来时刻；未来事件）；临近；数量（或质量）上接近（某一数字；某种水平

sense_info_list.en: a way of dealing with something or thinking about something; such as a problem or a task

examination_example.sentence: A multi-stage life will have profound changes not just in how you manage your career, but also in your <highlight>approach</highlight> to life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多阶段的人生不仅会对你的职业生涯产生深远的影响，也会对你的生活方式产生深远的影响。

examination_example.sentence: If your goal is to have standardized <highlight>approaches</highlight> to learning, then learning by doing doesn't really fit that mold anymore.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的目标是采用标准化的学习方法，那么“在做中学”就不再真正符合这种模式了

examination_example.sentence: At follow-up meetings, he urged parents to join him in advocating a "whole child" <highlight>approach</highlight> to schooling that respects "social-emotional development" and "deep and meaningful learning" over academics alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在接下来的会议中，他敦促家长们和他一样倡导“全人教育”，重视“社会情感发展”和“深入而有意义的学习”，而不是仅仅关注学业成绩。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>approach</highlight> that makes it easy to admire their colors and craftsmanship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种方式让霓虹灯的五彩斑斓和手工工艺很容易走进人们的视野，供人欣赏。

sense_info_list.en: come near someone or something in distance; time; level; or event

examination_example.sentence: The code to access the program cost $ 120— a big sum for Harper, who had already put down $ 450 for textbooks, and had rent day <highlight>approaching</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 访问该程序的代码需要花费120美元，这对哈珀来说是一大笔钱，她已经花了450美元买了教科书，而且房租日也快到了。

sense_info_list.en: speak to (someone) for the first time about something; typically with a proposal or request

examination_example.sentence: If you find yourself searching for something to say beyond small talk, try these tactics to find more interesting <highlight>approaches</highlight> to conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你发现自己在闲聊之外寻找可以说的话，试试这些策略，找到更有趣的谈话方式。

examination_example.sentence: Have you <highlight>approached</highlight> Mr. Bond about this particular problem?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有没有就这个特殊的问题联系过邦德先生？

examination_example.sentence: Well, at this stage, it would be better if you <highlight>approached</highlight> him directly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嗯，在这个阶段，你直接l联系他会更好。

sense_info_list.en: start to deal with something in a certain way
a road; sea passage; or other way leading to a place

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从事某事的特别方法、途径。
着重独特的程序或方式，尤指个人的偏爱或习惯。
多指行动的特殊方式或独特的方法。
指为达到某种目的或目标而采用的方法、手段或途径。
指有系统、有条理地办事或解决问题的方法。
书面用词，常指因个人爱好或传统习俗等因素而遵循的方法。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: come near someone or something in distance, time, level, or event

examination_example.sentence: Over the years, there have been a number of different techniques to help designers <highlight>approach</highlight> this important point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多年来，已经有许多不同的技术来帮助设计师接近这一重要的点。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Approaching</highlight> the vehicle, they saw that a woman was trying to get out of the broken window.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们走近那辆车，看到一个女人正试图从破碎的窗户里出去。

sense_info_list.en: a way of dealing with something or thinking about something, such as a problem or a task

examination_example.sentence: Mohan is cautious about this <highlight>approach</highlight>, yet she supports the purpose behind these digital beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Mohan对这种方法持谨慎态度，但她支持设计这些数字生物背后的目的。

examination_example.sentence: But I recently came across a study that shows why his <highlight>approach</highlight> works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我最近偶然发现了一项研究，解释了为什么他的方法有效。

examination_example.sentence: Meanwhile, another AI company, Soul Machines, is taking a more biological <highlight>approach</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，另一家人工智能公司Soul Machines（灵魂机器）正在采取一种更加生物化的方法。

sense_info_list.en: start to deal with something in a certain way

examination_example.sentence: Human qualities also involve how you think, how you <highlight>approach</highlight> problems, and how you break them down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人的品质还包括你如何思考，如何处理问题，如何分解问题。

着重独特的程序或方式，尤指个人的偏爱或习惯。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a way of dealing with something or thinking about something, such as a problem or a task

examination_example.sentence: My <highlight>approach</highlight> was simple and direct.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的方法是简单而直接的。

examination_example.sentence: The technical <highlight>approaches</highlight> of these vaccines can be a little different, but their aims are the same.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些疫苗的技术方法可能有些不同，但其目的是一样的。
